## composeConverter() function

Creates a key converter function for use in [Classes()](./vue-extra-decorators.classes.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function composeConverter(className: TFunction<string, [string]>, memberName: TFunction<string, [string]>): (name: string, member: boolean) => string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  className | <code>TFunction&lt;string, [string]&gt;</code> | The transformation to apply to the class name |
|  memberName | <code>TFunction&lt;string, [string]&gt;</code> | The transformation to apply to the object key[Classes()](./vue-extra-decorators.classes.md) [ClassesCamel()](./vue-extra-decorators.classescamel.md) [ClassesKebap()](./vue-extra-decorators.classeskebap.md) [ClassesPascal()](./vue-extra-decorators.classespascal.md) [ClassesSnake()](./vue-extra-decorators.classessnake.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`(name: string, member: boolean) => string`
